user_data.target_needs: I wanted comfortable and stylish sandals that would accommodate my foot issues while allowing me to walk for extended periods without discomfort.
purchase_reason: I was looking for comfortable footwear that would not irritate my bunion and metatarsal while also being stylish. The positive experience of walking extensively in them without discomfort was a significant factor in my decision.

Initially uncertain about the fit due to my dislike for thong sandals, I was pleasantly surprised by the comfort and ease of wear. The ability to slip them on and the comfort they provided after some use were key factors in my decision to purchase multiple pairs.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that offer comfort and support, especially for footwear and undergarments. I value features such as cushioning, lightweight materials, and a secure fit, as these contribute to an overall pleasant wearing experience. I tend to favor items that fit well and provide adequate support, particularly for my feet and ankles. Additionally, I appreciate products that are easy to wear and do not require a break-in period. On the other hand, I dislike items that lack proper support, fit poorly, or are uncomfortable, as these lead to dissatisfaction and the need for returns. Overall, I seek comfort, good fit, and supportive features in my purchases.

Item No.3 : Item Title: <New Balance Kid's Slide Sandal Slide Sandal> / Item ID: B07PL1QZJH / Price: $21.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Shoes', 'Athletic', 'Sport Sandals & Slides'] / Description: ['Slide into cushioned comfort with the sporty and stylish 100 sandals from New Balance. These simple slide sandals are the ultimate accessories for pre- or post-game locker-room relaxation. They’re constructed from one piece of super-soft EVA foam to provide the comfort and support you crave when you’re finished your run, swim or workout. They’re also a great option for those days when you’d rather chill than hit the gym. The fresh, sporty design pops with bold New Balance branding for a look that works at the beach or in the backyard. The convenient slip-on construction makes it easy to get in and out of these slides and the ground-contact EVA sole offers incredibly lightweight cushioning while providing abrasion resistance where needed. Toss these foam sandals in your beach bag or backpack for a quick-and-easy footwear change-up whenever you need it. Our cool and convenient 100 slip-on sandals are always ready to chill when you are.']
